name: Bob Holt
bio: Bob Holt is a JavaScript developer at Bocoup. Bob has a background in economics, finance, non-profit development, and education, all of which he tries to shoehorn into his approach to developing for the Open Web. He is project lead for Keel, a stabilizing framework for Backbone applications, in addition to contributing to jQueryâ€™s Learning site, Aura, CeeJS, and the HTML5 Boilerplate Ant Build Script. In his free time, Bob enjoys music, photography, and watching football in all its forms.
